body.codesample: pkg_setup() { # We need to know which GUI we're building in several # different places, so work it out here. if use gtk ; then if use gtk2 ; then export mypkg_gui="gtk2" else export mypkg_gui="gtk1" fi elif use motif then export mypkg_gui="motif" else export mypkg_gui="athena" fi }
